review: I always look forward to my visits to Dr. Srinivas Panchajanya because he consistently provides all the necessary information and gives me personalized attention with great care. His expertise and compassionate approach make each appointment a pleasant experience. I highly recommend him for anyone seeking top-notch dental care.

review: Most methodical friendly professional doctor who explains the treatment and the effects with the solution
reply_text: Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I would recommend Dr. Srinivas at any time.  My first experience for consulting him for tooth extraction and the procedure with this doctor was awesome. Dr Madhukeshwar Naik was the surgeon, and I have never seen anyone like them, who explain and are caring of their patients. Happy to have met them today for my procedure

Doctor, I want to express my utmost appreciation for the level of care I received from you and your staff recently. 

Thank you for being sympathetic to my fears about vising the dentist. It is obvious that you take pride in your work, and I feel very lucky to be one of your patients. I am very grateful for your care and compassion.

Thank you so much for providing me with such exceptional care.
reply_text: Thank you madam. I am and was disappointed to send you back without treatment but the situation warranted so. My responsibility then changed to "person for need/help" in case of any untoward incident.  Via followup calls came to know all went well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I suggest the doctor to everyone, who can make patients feel very warm while having treatment, even injections given by a doctor are painless, and post-treatment medications suggested by the doctor make patients who have not undergone root canal treatment, not feel any pain. Finally doctor will call and ask how are you and how are you feeling now (follow-up). One of the best dentists I have seen.
reply_text: Thank you Mr Vijay, I have taken out many patients fear of undergoing RCT. Striving to do better than last time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
Excellent, friendly and treatment satisfaction guaranteed!
Spectrum Dental Clinic and Dr. Srinivas has been my go-to dentist, living abroad I consult him with any dental issues and each visit back home Dr. makes sure I drop by for my a check-up. No waiting time, very humble and friendly Dr. and explains the treatment well beforehand. Recently got my first RCT done and it was painless. Inspite of my tight schedule, Dr. Srinivas made sure I got the best treatment. Also, was in touch to follow up after.
I happily recommend Spectrum Dental Clinic for all your dental care and treatment needs
reply_text:
Thank you Mr Samarth for your kind words.
At Spectrum Dental Clinic J P Nagar 1st PHASE,  you are going to get the best treatment,  no matter who the person is.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have visited Dr. Srinivas for my tooth issue. Actually my earlier dentist told me that I need to get Root canal done immediately as there is infection at one teeth.
But Srinivas sir after careful evaluation of teeth and taking X rays  ruled out of infection and said no need for RCT.
He explained issue very well and suggested wait and watch approach. He is highly approacha ble. I am very happy that he is not hurrying for RCT of my teeth.He is highly knowledgeable,  experienced and  skilled RCT specialist. 
I can confidently say one can approach him for any dental related issues without any second thought.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am with this doctor for more than 10 years. My aself & My wife is getting treatment. But the cost is increasing & we are not getting Insurance Claim on this. Where as Cataract Surgery is about 3 to 4 hours duration & we can go home on the same day without admission. Yhis is Covered under Insurance. But Dental Treatment is not covered. This need to be take up with Insurance Authorities.
reply_text: Yes sir, insurance companies should start including dental treatment also as part of the coverage.  Almost all types of policies only cover hospitalization related treatment. Indian Dental Association is working on it. There are some private companies which are ready to step in, they have tie up with certain bigger clinics and hospital attached dental clinic. Hoping we will be able to get the insurance coverage soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Srinivas  treated me for Root Canal Treatment (RCT).  I had a wonderful experience. His approach towards his patients his very friendly and that itself takes your pain and worry away. He explained me about the procedure in great detail in the beginning itself. Initially I was very scared to  go through RCT but I had a painless experience of RCT. He completed my RCT with great precision and  gave me right advice to put a  right cap required for my tooth . He is meticulous and have deep expertise in his work.  I give highest recommendation from all perspectives for his work. Thanks.
reply_text: Thanks a ton for your words of appreciation. It was a pleasure to treat a very cooperative patient like  you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife had to undergo root canal and crown fixing for 4 teeth. He did a splendid root canal job. He also advised us to have crown from a good vendor who gives guarantee. He will not rush through the process.  He does things patently and perfectly. I had root canals done for my teeth 2 years back. That experience also was good. He is patent friendly and during covid he also did online consultations. In case of emergency one can contact him through whatsapp for quick online advise.He is a dependable doctor who has expertise and I have no hesitation in recommending his name for anyone seeking excellent dental procedure.
reply_text: Your kind words are really encouraging . Thank you very much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a root canal treatment in this clinic. First of all Dr is very good person. My experience was very good. My root canal was done just 2 days before. my crown placemat is pending.I have sensitivity issue both the side. one side root canal is completed. Another side is pending.I need to visit again for another side and crown placement.I am happy with the treatment. Dr called me to check my health status after root canal and always keep in touch through WhatsApp. I did not get much pain during root canal. My root canal treatment was in one sitting. Dr completed my root canal with very sensitive way and precisely.I will update my next visit experience also.
reply_text: Thank you for your words of appreciation.  Happy to help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had gone for my daughter's dental filling with this doctor. The doctor was very attentive and detail-oriented since this filling was a bit complex. The doctor answered all our queries and made her felt comfortable. I would recommend this doctor to anyone.
reply_text: Listening is a very important part of our profession. There lies half or more of the diagnosis, concerns, past experiences based on which we strategize/customize the treatment plan to achieve the goal with least discomfort to the patient. Prefer to keep consultation appointment separate to explain pros and cons of each procedure.
